briefTitle: Emergency Treatment of Coral Snake Envenomation With Antivenom
conditions: Toxic Effect of Coral Snake Venom

armGroups.label: Antivenom
interventionNames: Drug: Snake (Micrurus) North American immune F(ab')2 Equine

interventions.name: Snake (Micrurus) North American immune F(ab')2 Equine

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Male or female of any age. Presenting for emergency treatment of coral snake bite.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Prior use of coral snake antivenom for this envenomation. Allergy to horse serum.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Mean Venom Level From Baseline to 24 Hours
Change in Mean Antivenom Level From Baseline to 24 Hours
